attributes.action: Allow tax on fuel used to go to work to be refunded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sure I am not the only one that uses a good part of there weekly income to buy fuel that you have to use to get to your place of work.
At present I use approx £35.00 per week for work commuting and about 90% of my annual milage is the daily drive to work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
